alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:38PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 630 PM MST... At 538 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms near Lake Pleasant moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, New River, Sun City, Wittmann, Lake Pleasant, Vistancia and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 211 and 241. US Highway 60 between mile markers 126 and 146. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 13 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
